Beaudet has said that "TÃªtes Ã  claques was an accident." He was originally trying to make a series using [[stop motion animation]], but quickly discovered that "90% of the time it takes to animate is spent moving the eyes and mouth." He tried doing it the regular way, but because he was "too lazy" he decided to film his own face and superimpose his eyes and mouth on the [[figurine]]s.<ref name="Interview">{{cite web| |author=TVA | year=2006| language=French| title=Michel Beaudet Interview |work=Interview | url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IKA4BodZkLE | accessdate=2007-01-08}}</ref>
